title: The works of Professor Wilson of the University of Edinburgh,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: 2 The Fruid's su' o' sma' troots, and I sune had a string.

title: The works of Professor Wilson of the University of Edinburgh,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: Sae I just thocht I wad try the Fruid wi' the flee, and put on a professor.

title: The works of Professor Wilson of the University of Edinburgh,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: But I forgot I wasna on foot — the beast got blawn, and comin up the Fruid, 1 reested wi' me on Garlet-Dod.
